articles.title: Boris Johnson condemns Trump's actions
articles.description: UK Prime Minister Boris Johnson condemns President Trump's actions to encourage riots at the US Capitol and says that he's glad that democracy has prevailed.

articles.title: World leaders react to the storming of the Capitol
articles.description: Riots at the Capitol have caused horror among US allies, while CNN's Clarissa Ward said that US adversaries were quick to use the unrest to their advantage.

articles.title: Graham criticizes Trump and Giuliani over Capitol riots
articles.description: Republican Sen. Lindsey Graham reacts to pro-Trump supporters rioting at the US Capitol.

articles.author: Eoin McSweeney, CNN
articles.title: Body of man who fell into Victoria Falls in New Year's Day tragedy retrieved
articles.description: The body of a man who fell into Victoria Falls gorge on New Year's Day has been retrieved after a group of volunteers abseiled and swam to reach his body, authorities told CNN.

articles.title: Pelosi calls for invoking 25th amendment to remove Trump
articles.description: Speaker of the House Rep. Nancy Pelosi (D-CA) called on Vice President Mike Pence to invoke the 25th Amendment to remove President Donald Trump and said if the Cabinet failed to do so she would consider moving forward with impeachment.

articles.author: Ashley Strickland, CNN
articles.title: New NASA space telescope will explore the Big Bang
articles.description: A new space telescope will help scientists look back in time at the origin of our universe and the galaxies and planetary systems that have populated it ever since.

articles.title: Saint Paul mayor: Now that Democrats are in control, let's really help struggling Americans
articles.description: With Democrats preparing to control the presidency, House and Senate in 2021, we have an opportunity — and a duty — to authorize a bold investment capable of seeing our country through the historic and compound crises of today.

articles.author: Analysis by Daniel Dale
articles.title: Trump's years of lying led to the Capitol calamity
articles.description: The lies have always had victims. And the liar has never much seemed to care.

articles.author: Analysis by Chris Cillizza, CNN Editor-at-large
articles.title: What Mitt Romney got exactly right about the failures of the Republican Party
articles.description: Mitt Romney is the only person in the Senate who knows what Donald Trump is going through. Romney, like Trump, lost a presidential general election and knows the sting and soul-searching that follows such a rejection.
articles.content:
THE POINT -- NOW ON YOUTUBE! 
In each episode of his weekly YouTube show, Chris Cillizza will delve a little deeper into the surreal world of politics. Click to subscribe!

articles.title: Reporters reckon with radicalization in America: 'You are being lied to'
articles.description: Democracy prevailed with the early morning certification of Joe Biden's victory. But deep scars remain -- both at the Capitol and beyond.
